mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_user (user_code, user_name, user_acct, user_pwd, id_card, sex, phone, email, remark, is_deleted, sort_no, gmt_create, create_by, gmt_modified, last_modified_by, version) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userAcct}, #{userPassword}, #{idCard}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{mail}, #{remark}, #{isDeleted}, 0, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{lastModifiedBy}, 0)
mapper.update: update t_sys_user set user_name = #{userName}, user_acct = #{userAcct}, id_card = #{idCard}, sex = #{sex}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{mail}, remark = #{remark}, gmt_modified = now(), last_modified_by = #{lastModifiedBy}, version = version + 1 where user_code = #{userId} and version = #{version}
mapper.select: select user_code userId, user_name userName, user_acct userAcct, user_pwd userPassword, id_card idCard, sex sex, phone phone, email mail, remark remark, version version from t_sys_user where user_code = #{userId} and is_deleted = 0

select a.user_code userId, a.user_name userName, a.user_acct userAcct, a.user_pwd userPassword, a.id_card idCard, a.sex sex, a.phone, a.email, a.remark, a.is_deleted, a.sort_no, a.gmt_create, a.create_by, a.gmt_modified, a.last_modified_by, a.version from t_sys_user a where a.is_deleted = 0
and a.user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
and a.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
order by gmt_create desc
